name: Haunted (old game)
description:
Old Game #1

Survive in a Dungeon for as long as you can.

There are many enemies, but when you kill them, you get less powerful (e.g. slower, weaker, slower recharge, slide).

You also have a shield and a dash to use.

Every 5 levels, you must fight the ghosts of every enemy you have killed, then you have an opportunity to use collected treasure to upgrade yourself (e.g. faster, stronger, quicker recharge).

Made in a week (not full-time).
